website_summaries.verdict: Designed to give you a precise feel for your putting stroke by using a limited amount of material in the grip.
pros: Only measures 1 inch in diameter, which some golfers will like because they can use a light touch on the putter
Has a tacky polyurethane outer layer, so you can keep control of the putter, even in poor weather
Has a few color combination choices
cons: Those with bigger hands almost certainly will want a thicker grip material

customer_reviews.title: outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the petrified grip on my 40-year-old Bullseye putter with this, and it brought the old club back to life. As soon as my brother-in-law saw and felt this, we ordered another for his old putter. I prefer the Slim style of the Super- Stroke to the fat one, for which I can never get a proper feel. Installation is a snap if you have one of the kits designed for the purpose, and the regripped putter is playable immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk23510

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!!
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a 2.0 version of this grip. I have smaller hands and it was too big for my taste. Bought the 1.0, installed myself and fits perfectly for me. Like the feel in my hands. Highly recommend going out and testing grip sizes before purchasing online. Would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Love this grip
customer_reviews.text: Love this grip! Was hesitant to make the plunge to the super stroke but did and just after one round I’m in love. It just feels so nice in my hands and helps keep my putting stroke nice and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: A great grip.
customer_reviews.text: Been using these since they came out. They feel really good with the right amount of grip and last a long time. Priced right, fast shipping it will be on my new driver very soon.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good for a stroke
customer_reviews.text: Perfect grip size for small to medium size hand. Works well. Fits hands as expected. Better than standard grips
customer_reviews.author: Gw; Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Also no instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Hole in grip is too small to slide over putter shaft. Tried three times on my Odessy White Hot and each time would not slide on. It was so tight that it would tear tape from shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Yochum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these grips. Great for creating a reference for your grip for consistency.
customer_reviews.author: eric jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite putter grip--pain in the butt to put on
customer_reviews.author: CrazyBob

customer_reviews.title: Great grip! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grip that immediately provided more confidence with the putter. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Vlahovic

customer_reviews.title: Thank you! Exactly what I was looking for. ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! Exactly what I was looking for. I received this item in response to my honest review...
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd T. Narimatsu

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a thicker grip without getting one those massive super strokers, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Andrewski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Results Grip
customer_reviews.text: This a a replacement grip -- I've been using a S.S. 1.0 grip for over a year, and love it. I wanted to test out a larger, 2.0 grip, but wanted to be ready to switch right back to the 1.0 grip that has been successful for me. So I bought both grips at the same time. The 1.0 grip is perfect for those who want a little more stability in the putting stroke without going to a hugely oversized grip. I like both 1.0 and 2.0 grips now -- not sure which one will "win my loyalty."
customer_reviews.author: Rutlander

customer_reviews.title: Good feeling putter grip.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a larger grip without going too large. This one worked.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Gass

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits pretty good. Just need to get used to the putter head weight to grip for better scoring.
customer_reviews.author: Keoki

customer_reviews.title: nothing over sized about this grip
customer_reviews.text: not much better then standard grip, good for golfers 10 and under I would guess.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Has a good feel.
customer_reviews.text: I like this diameter grip. I wanted a slightly larger diameter at the lower end, but not overly large at the top so this worked well. I have used the larger sizes, but this is the one I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

product_meta.title: SuperStroke Ultra Slim 1.0 Putter Grip, Oversized, Lightweight Golf Grip, Non-slip, 10.50"L X 1.00"W, USGA Approved
product_meta.description: The Super Stroke Ultra Slim 1.0 putter grips are our original patented design and shapes. The oversized grips ensure even grip pressure and engage the big muscles in your stroke to minimize wrist action. The No Taper Technology has helped millions of golfers achieve a smoother, more consistent, and more reliable putting stroke. Tourney after tourney, major after major, these grips have come to redefine not only the putter grip, but putting as a whole.
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR GRIP - The Super Stroke Ultra Slim 1.0 Putter Grip is 1.00" in Diameter and is Made of a Tacky Polyurethane Outer Layer
NO TAPER - Exclusive Super Stroke Technology Used in the Super Stroke Ultra Slim 1.0 Putter Grip for a More Consistent Stroke During Rounds of Golf
NON-SLIP GRIP - The CROSS-TRACTION Surface Texture Prevents the Super Stroke Ultra Slim 1.0 Putter Grip User's Hands From Slipping During Increment Weather Conditions
LIGHTWEIGHT GRIP - The Super Stroke Ultra Slim Putter Grip Is Made of EVA Foam Which Gives Your Putter A Lightweight Grip for A Maximum Feel
TOUR PROVEN - The Super Stroke Ulta Slim 1.0 is Used by PGA Major Champions Sergio Garcia and Jason Dufner

specifications.Manufacturer: The Golf Shop of Wake Forest
